channel.title: admin on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Academic

item.description: I am a second year Dphil student in Computer Vision at the Department of Engineering Science working under the supervision of Prof. Philip Torr where I work closely with Dr. Puneet Dokania. I am lucky enough to be supervised by some remarkable researchers from Adobe Richard Zhang ,Eli Shechtman, Oliver Wang , Alyosha Efros. Research The central goal of my research is to be able to generate and edit realistic images with very sparse user interaction.
